item.title: Replacing the Windows console with Cmder
item.description: In a previous post I talked about [terminal replacements for Mac OS X]({% post_url 2015-10-22-terminal-replacement-on-mac-os-x %}). Unfortunately, on Windows the choices are less numerous. PowerShell is pretty awesome and on Windows 8/10 it quickly became my default environment, especially with PosGit installed. However, I was still looking for something … more nix‘ish. I tried Babun, but I found the cygwin environment just foreign enough that I wasn’t comfortable with it.
